title: How to Invest $2 Million in Retirement and Live Off Six Figures Without Worry
subtitle: A strategic approach to managing retirement assets for long-term financial security.
content:
How to Invest $2 Million in Retirement and Live Off Six Figures Without Worry

I'm Tyler, a former financial advisor and portfolio manager. Now I create financial content for free so you don’t have to pay for it.

1. Invest in a Low-Cost Index Fund

I would invest 100% of the money in a low-cost index fund like Vanguard’s VOO. This would provide me with approximately $22,800 a year in dividends, while my funds are invested in 500 of the world’s most profitable and stable companies, including Broadcom, Meta, and Berkshire Hathaway.

2. Monthly Sales of Investments

On the second day of each month, I’d sell 0.5% of my investments. That would give me an additional $120,000 a year, avoiding a large selling spree at once. On average, markets are higher in a year than they are today.

3. Receive Social Security Benefits

I’d then receive another $24,000 or so from Social Security. You can find out your projections by going to ssa.gov today.

4. Enjoy Life in Sedona

Finally, I’d move to Sedona, Arizona, and live off of $130,000 a year post-tax, fully devoting myself to crystal healing. Consider that 94% of my assets are still in stocks, giving me about a 96% chance of outliving both my money and my chakras.

Conclusion

If any of this is helpful, sign up for my free weekly newsletter by clicking the link in my bio. I’ll send you over another money playbook that actually works each week.
